website_summaries.verdict: This tankini swimsuit's versatile boy short bottoms let you go from beach volleyball to water sports effortlessly.
pros: The thicker fabric holds its shape well and gives the tankini a sporty feel
The racerback outline has adjustable crossover straps at the back for better fit and ease of movement
The ombré print in a number of colors is on trend, too
cons: Tends to run large, especially the top

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect after adjusting straps!
customer_reviews.text: It looked too large when I first opened it. After playing with the straps I was very pleasantly surprised with how well it all fits! I ordered a large. I’m 5’8’ and 163 pounds. For reference for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hosey

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price-  comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size XL and an XXL. I usually always wear an XL, but wasn’t sure if the item was from China and that the sizing would be off. I kept the xxl because it gave me just an extra bit of room without being too tight. Already wore it in our pool with friends and had lots of compliments. The bottoms are a bit odd tho. When I put them on- it almost felt like they were on backwards for some reason. They weren’t tho. Overall it’s a beautiful colored suit and looks exactly like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: obagi girl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive tankini and I really like it. It's about the same quality as a Target suit, it comes with swim shorts and a top. The straps are somewhat adjustable, but when extended or lower they don't do much because of the cris-cross pattern of the straps in the back. It fits fairly well, and is nice and loose in the belly area. If you have larger boobs, order a size up; as someone who is pretty average I was squished in a little more than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: Suit is more gorgeous in person!!! This is the perfect suit and very flattering!! I'm a 32DD and the top fits perfect, I went with a large for that reason and glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewellfish

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and 180plbs with a 36DDD chest This fits perfectly. The only downside I had with this bathing suit was when I got it where the straps would hook in on to the bathing suit it was just poorly sewn so I just read your soda and it fits fine
customer_reviews.author: VanassaVanity

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 1/2 158 pounds with a 36c in bust. I sound large but I guarantee you I have more muscle than fat. I bought the large. Perfect fit. Shorts are a little more snug as I do have a good sz butt.
customer_reviews.author: Ms new Irene

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Tankini
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! It gets a little technical in the back with the straps, but well worth it when you get it on properly. I liked it so much I bought it in blue and in purple. I’m not the skinniest I’ve ever been so this swimsuit really helps with camouflaging my bulges, LOL. The quality is great; you just can’t beat the price. True to size. This turned into my favorite swimsuit immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebear

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than expected shorts really short
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but the people who rated it must like to be a stuffed sausage! I am 5'1" and 137 pounds. Size 36D and my boobs were squished like pancakes. Also, the bottoms are booty shorts, not board shorts. I am going to reorder in a large (I got a medium after measuring and reading reviews) as the suit is cute and the fabric is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am short, overweight and large busted. According to the size chart, I should have ordered an XL, but I ordered a L because I don’t want my swimsuit to fall off when wet. I should have ordered a M! As soon as I went into the ocean, it became so loose and baggy, even when the straps were tightened all the way. Also, because I am short, this was much too long, extending down to the bottom of the shorts. I still gave it 5 stars because it is a great suit! Just be careful with the size. In my opinion, order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: mbfrat

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, runs big
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this fit my plus-size body. I didn't even mind baring my tummy... the top runs big. I'm a generous 38DD and the top is so big, I'm sure if it gets wet, I'll fall right out of it. But, if I order a size smaller, the bottoms will be too big and I have narrow hips, just a round tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Different from photo
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is poor. I am wearing it for the first time in this picture and the black shorts and the black in the top are two different shades. I also was hoping that the blue would be more of a neon shade, like in the picture, but mine is darker.
customer_reviews.author: IUPbethy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as scheduled. Fits great looks great until I washed it in a gentle cycle. Hung to dry when I noticed padding in bra is not secured in any way. Padding shifted and folded. Because it is sewn into a “pocket” it is difficult to correct. Board shorts look great except the elastic in waist band is way to thin for the casing it is in. Rolls inside casing. I will probably replace the thin elastic for a wide one that fits and lies flat.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie

customer_reviews.title: Tank top bottom loose/floats in water
customer_reviews.text: This suit is cute. However, because the tank top part is a loose flap, the bottom of the tank top floats up when you enter the water and/or sitting in a hot tub with the bubbles coming in. Which shows my stomach which defeats the whole purpose of buying a tank top suit (hiding my stomach). Also now that I have used this suit through the summer, it seems that when in a hot tub with the bubbles on, the shorts of the suite fill up with air. Which is embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and junky
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is cheap and junky. After one wash the elastic in the bottoms completely stretched out and it’s now way too big (fit fine initially). I can’t get the straps in the back to ever lay nicely and it’s always bunched up. The lads in the front are also all bunched up and I can’t get those to adjust properly...should be stitched into place. I’ll never buy one of your suits again...garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rosiek

customer_reviews.title: Returning but very cute
customer_reviews.text: Here is the thing... The shorts fit perfect. loved them. the top was way too loose/big. Loved the colors and the back is super cute with all the bands.. just couldn't make it work. The top needs to be more fitted because the way it hangs, it turns it to frumpy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnaped

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, but hugs every curve
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but the material is thin and not a high quality. It really clings to every curve and I hadn't even been in the water yet! If you are not self conscious about your midsection, I think you'd be okay with it. However I'm a new momma and was looking for something a little more forgiving/tummy control. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: LHeat

customer_reviews.title: So cute on
customer_reviews.text: I am always leery of ordering a swimsuit online. I cringe at the thought. But this was super cute on and covered up all my annoying fat areas. I wish I would have ordered a size up but that was no fault of the company....I didn’t realize I had gained a little winter weight lol! All in all a great swimsuit. I have DD breast size and this is very flattering believe it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Mah... its ok
customer_reviews.text: Top moves around because the bra is not stitched on the bottom. It moves around. Way to open and I'm not a prude at all. I'm only keeping for a back up. Several times I out it into the Goodwill pile but I grabbed it out. Material is nice. Too bad you guys couldn't take the extra few minutes to sew it in.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Di Novo Kaspari

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 10-12 and bought a large and it fit perfect. I am 5'7" and 168lbs. Great material, well made and great support in the top. Well definitely buy another in a different color. Fantastic price for a 2 piece! Usually just the top is $25. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: breast cups suck!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really pretty swimsuit but the 2 triangles that are inserted for coverage are not sewn in and don't stay put. They are bulgy and akward. Also the suit came with one seam ripped when I got it. I have a sewing machine so it was fixable but still. The bottoms are made weird too. The cut is not good and not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mixed matched swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different sizes an x-large and an xx-large because I wasn't sure on sizing. I am glad I did because the x-large bottoms did not fit but top did. The xx-large bottoms fit and the top was way to big . So I kept what fit and sent rest back.
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Fits well. I’m 5”3 and 125 pounds, 34 D. I got the medium. I took the padding out, just my preference. I don’t love the crazy straps on the back. They fit fine and are adjustable just a bit much to manage for my liking. Shorts have nice tummy coverage and top flares from the bust a little so not too tight but still tailored enough to be flattering on my older post baby belly. Great quality suit though and I love the colors. Just like the picture. I will probably buy it in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: A little loose and straps get tangled a lot
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2 135 and I should have bought a small. I’m top heavy and this bathing suit keeps them up. I love that. Great color and material. The straps are almost annoying enough to throw it out. Once you get them in place it’s great! Then you wash it... starts all over. I wouldn’t buy it again because of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Hated it. So cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and straps broke easily . Now it’s garbage . Thanks for wasting my money !!!!😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5”, 185lbs and typically a size 14. I sized up based on other reviews and it fits well. The bust is just a bit too big but not enough to make it uncomfortable. The straps on the back are confusing to figure out and a pain in the back to straighten out, they came all tangled but I think I I finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A

customer_reviews.title: Great for big boobies
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" 140 lb 34 DDD. The large fits great in the cup but a little loose around rib cage. It's a quick fix on the sewing machine. (It's hard to find a bathing suit that fits large chest and small back) I would say the support is about an 8 out of 10. The craftsmanship is surprisingly nice and the colors are super vibrant. Great price for this kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Style
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! Bought it to take on our trip to Punta Cana. I had four suits with me and wore this one for most of the trip. It is very well made, true to size and the color was so bright and vibrant. I would recommend this suit and may be buying in additional color!
customer_reviews.author: EMK3

customer_reviews.title: Feels knotty..
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Form fitting and flattering at the bust. Con: The back knots up and is practically impossible to make look nice after washing, even though it was washed in a bra bag. The only other thing that bothered me, may not bother others. The top was a bit long. I was hoping to get more of a tank top feel, but it felt like it was long like a tshirt.. I really wish they would redesign the back, because the knotting has prevented me from wanting to wear it after several times. Now I'm back to using my old bathing suit. :/
customer_reviews.author: A. Andel

customer_reviews.title: Order one to two sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife. The first one I got I got her a large and it was just a tiny bit too small so I got an extra large and sent the other one back and it was perfect. Not to mention my wife looked absolutely amazing in it. Very affordable very well made and it looks extremely good on the right body type.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy sublett

customer_reviews.title: More fitted than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium after looking at the size chart and it is more fitted than expected. I wanted a loose fit top to hide my stomach rolls, but instead it highlights them. If you are curvier and looking for a bathing suit that is loose fitting, this is not it. Everything fit well, so I don't think going up a size is an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical on what size I should order due to the other reviews (people said it runs small and that the medium is like xs) but I ended up going with my normal size (small) and it fits perfect! I love it! I'm 4' 11" 105 lbs. The colors are very vibrant and looks just like the picture. Will probably be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Briana J.

customer_reviews.title: Side boob!
customer_reviews.text: So I really loved the colors of this bathing suit! The bottoms fit great, but the top was a bit tight and the side straps are pretty small, offering little coverage for "side boob". Overall i do like this swim suit but it is not the most flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love!!!! Do not use the Amazon size chart. Use the size chart that is in the description and measure yourself before ordering. I am a 36DD and the size I ordered works great. Not to small in the top like most bikinis I find. This suit is awesome and looks great on! The color is gorgeous and I cannot wait to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered the purple in this but received the red. That's ok, it's still pretty. I also ordered the blue (I did receive the blue in that order). I love the way these fit. Super cute, modest but very stylish. I had never purchased a suit with the boyshort bottoms before so I wasn't sure if I would like them. LOVE THEM! I followed the size chart based on my normal size and for this particular suit, it is a perfect fit! I was very happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and very flattering!! I bought this outfit for white water rafting, it fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I'm 5'1 and 135ish and I got a medium. It can definitely make you appear a bit bigger in hips with the way it flares but overall I think it is flattering and a great buy. Also, the straps never got tangled for me. Overall I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah R

customer_reviews.title: Wear at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: This suit was great the first time I wore it, I was so happy with it. 2nd time around, the underwire starts sticking through the fabric, stabbing me from both cups! The straps are designed to slide out, so you can criss cross if you want, they kept popping off! I almost flashed everyone! So embarrassing! Now I'm stuck with a suit I'll never wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Best fit of the suits I purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought several suits for our spring break trip that didn't fit great, so I was a little slow to buying again. I saw this one and it had great reviews so I gave it a go. I am glad I did. I finally scored one that fit good and doesn't pinch or cut in weird places.
customer_reviews.author: Jervis

customer_reviews.title: Know you’re size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Bought two other swimsuits at the same time, same size, different manufacturer. Those two fit as expected. This one was too small. Not where I couldn’t get it on, but enough that it was uncomfortable and not flattering.
customer_reviews.author: JAlabama

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Bathing suit came in a nice ziplock bag. I don’t usually order clothes online for fear of them not fitting right. This bathing suit top fit me perfectly! The shorts are a bit shorter then it looks in the picture so I opted to buy other shorts that are longer on the thighs. I will be ordering this suit in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but don't size up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit but had to return it for smaller size in the top. The cups seem to be at least whole cup size larger than my bra. Don't size up!
customer_reviews.author: elemental em

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was super nervous about getting a bathing suit on here because I'm super picky. I am larger breasted so I like to have good coverage and control. I have only tried this on but so far it covers well and looks super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to see so many good bathing suit choices here on amazon. Who actually LIKES bathing suit shopping?? Definitely not me. Having so many to chose from on here was the hardest part! I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Marandino

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors and it fits well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors and it fits well. I like this suite and my husband likes it on me, too. The only thing I don't like about it is that it has removable pads in the bra. I like those to be sewn in and so they don't wad all up when you wash the bathing suit. It is a pain to straighten them out again.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Red Rider

customer_reviews.title: Very cute swim short/top
customer_reviews.text: Medium Size 8 5_3” 130lbs 36C Fits great, very comfortable top and nice shorts cover right to bottom of cheeks. Great colors. Bra top padding perfect. Best buy in a while!! Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.author: K——-L—-P————

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit. Fits perfectly very comfortable. I like how the top did not have removable padding. It is made like a bra which is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Travis.R

customer_reviews.title: Medium-Cute Board shorts bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bathing suit in a medium for myself but, it was to small in the chest. For reference purposes I am a 36D. So I give it to my Mom, it fits her great! Color is nice and bright, it hides all the unflattering areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Bella

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had this suit for a few months and everything is still good. The top can be a pain to put on at times because of all the straps in the back but it’s really pretty!
customer_reviews.author: nicole t coovert

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine I believe at 20 and it's a little tight but did end up gaining weight after I quit smoking other then that I like this suit looks good
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Sizes matter
customer_reviews.text: These bathing suits kind a run on the Large size just on the top only so you’re gonna have to try to guesstimate which size you should get it pretty much a crapshoot LOL
customer_reviews.author: Willowbear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set! I am a 36 DDD and 5'8". It is so comfortable. The length of the short is perfect to wear alone or slip denim shorts over without chaffing. I purchased the sister-suit (bikini top) to be able to mix and match, but this is my go-to currently.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love the top, bottoms too small
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the top. It fits really well and is super cute. The bottoms are too small to even put on. And they're much shorter than what's pictured.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: great for tweens and teens
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, bought for my 11 year old , very tween appropriate for a young woman who already have swurves and curves, and you don't something to grown up or to "little kiddish"
customer_reviews.author: SLL1980

customer_reviews.title: It looks nothing like the picture showed !!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit looks nothing like the picture displayed !! I was thinking I was ordering a cute tank top with board shorts to match and it came with bikini bottoms and an oversized shirt /tank top that did not look anything like the photo !!
customer_reviews.author: liz clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is just as beautiful as the picture shows, maybe more so. Fits was true to size. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Very flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this swim suit! It fits so well and is very flattering! Can't wait to put it to use on my upcoming beach trip! Please ignore the fur on the mirror in the picture I know it needs dusting lol
customer_reviews.author: Kandee

customer_reviews.title: Top fits, bottoms too big.
customer_reviews.text: Nice suit, top fit but bottoms are too large. Seller was great and quickly sent a smaller bottoms. Would purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: BMcD

customer_reviews.title: Fitness swimwear
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! Fits great, gives support and stays where it is supposed to during water activities!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Reese's Pieces

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my sister and she liked it, she just does not like the shorts. Because it looked and feels like spandex , but over all it fit liked it expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute on my daughter -- pretty true to size.. the back is so cute. Straps in back are a little annoying to re -adjust after it's washed , but otherwise love it !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1000

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Cute style and color and both the top and the bottom fit as expected. The straps are a bit much so we'll see how it goes. 5'7", 150 lbs bought a L.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit but runs really small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a small shirt and size 6 jeans. I ordered a medium and barely fit into it. The pics don't show crossed straps but description does. Not sure which is better. Does not push anything up. Cups seem big for size of suit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit fits great, I only with the back we easier to adjust by myself and their was an underwire in the bra. But I would definatly buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute top and bright colors. The bottoms are smaller tha expected but I got different swim shorts anyway. I like the adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Cani2006

customer_reviews.title: Bold and beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Love color blocks .Fits awesome. I did get longer bike thle swim shorts to cover thighs .
customer_reviews.author: CROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit, lots of compliments on the color. Top is very adjustable to get the right fit. Material is on the thicker side. Don't hesitate to buy this suit.
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: It’s a YES from me!👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a large for my middle school daughter who is about 5’3” & 158 lbs. It fits perfect in every area. Very modest. Colors are vibrant. The straps are a little funky...ie: I’m not sure why some of them detach and some of them don’t...but it’s not really a problem and the strappy back is pretty cute. I will actually probably order her another one soon, because sometimes we have a hard time finding swimwear that fits her nicely but is also age-appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Very comfortable. Nice fabric. I’m amazed at the quality given the low price. It is my new favorite suit!
customer_reviews.author: WendyMath

customer_reviews.title: Unclear size
customer_reviews.text: Top fits wonderful but the bottom is a little bit too big. Both items were ordered for large but I believe that the bottoms were XL. Would have loved to be able to order items separate.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Monita

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the large and medium to be sure. I normally wear a medium and it fit well. I am 5’5” and 140 lbs. love the design.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Bright but complicated
customer_reviews.text: The colors of this is so cute but the back is so hard to figure out if you take it apart I had to send it back. I for the life of me couldn’t get it back right. The colors are super bright and a cute suit just complicated.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Shorts fit funny.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute suit. The shorts fit funny. They are made so the front and back are the same, so it doesn't fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Carey

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a 4-6, went up a size, medium was still snug.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Teeny Bopper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the swimsuit for a trip to Cancun, just wanted something comfortable not too sexy. I just didn’t like the way it looked on me, so that’s why the four stars. Just seemed like something more for a teenager, than an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Material is great. Design is great
customer_reviews.text: Material is great. Design is great. My reason for a low rating is because following the size chart I need a different size top and bottom. So I ordered both sizes. Well the chart stands true I do need a different size top and bottom. Since you cannot purchase that way I am debating sending both back due to this. Such a shame I really liked this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Beam

customer_reviews.title: Won’t look like this on you but seems to be made well
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have this girl’s boobs, this suit will NOT look like this on you. That said, I really liked it and it seems to be supportive and held up well playing in the ocean all week at Daytona.
customer_reviews.author: zzkl

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I’m happy with this. I do wish the shorts were a little longer and the back wasn’t so strapped. Other than those two things, it’s perfect & fits well. I did size up due to my last online order for a bra my normal size was way too tight, so I decided to go one size up here, and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The first suit I received for perfectly but there stitching was off in the seam and left a large hole. I returned it and got another promptly. The second one was good accept it for tighter than the first.
customer_reviews.author: H. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so skeptical about buying clothes online because they never fit, they are always too small. This fits perfectly and looks great! I am very pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: browneyes1274

customer_reviews.title: Padding moves
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just don't like that the padding comes out of the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to adjust straps
customer_reviews.text: The back straps are very difficult to adjust. If not adjusted the straps hang all over the place. I am very disappointed in this swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Mawson

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable priced swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Did not care of the top. Too many straps and actually the tip was too large; bottoms were fine. That is my figure flaw!
customer_reviews.author: Kkb

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The quality of things is very good, completely consistent with the picture description, very satisfied, really like it, completely beyond expectations, the delivery speed is very fast, the packaging is very carefully and strict, the service attitude of the logistics company is very good, the delivery speed is very fast, very satisfied with a shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off...unsure what size would actually work.
customer_reviews.text: size ordered based on reviews of others...top WAY TOO SMALL and bottoms were WAY TOO TIGHT. (36DD, 5'7", 170 lbs) Cute suit, just sizing is way off...
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: It was used and broken
customer_reviews.text: It was used, broken strap, and smelled like a hoagie ( B.O.) it’s likely someone wore this and returned it, but it never should have went back into inventory
customer_reviews.author: Tech Service

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: It fit pretty good the shorts are a lol short for me but it all depends on how short you wear your shorts. The color is very bright and you can adjust the top.
customer_reviews.author: melissa truelove

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The fitting made me look fat. Maybe I need smaller. I am returning and ordering one size smaller
customer_reviews.author: aruna

customer_reviews.title: Top great bottoms huge
customer_reviews.text: I really like the top and with the adjustment and detachable back straps I can play with the look. The downfall is the bottoms are huge and I knew they would be because my upper and lower body are two different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Strap connections broke when I first tried it on. Sizing was perfect but the connecting clasps, I sewed them in place to repair and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pooler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the seller to include cup sizes in the description for better fitment. Good product though
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kerns

customer_reviews.title: the bra does not hold up to washing (by hand even)
customer_reviews.text: I wore this suit twice. I went to hand wash & lay to dry, the whole bra top shrunk even with hand washing & lay flat to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Great material, sizing not so accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love the material but the size was small. So if you wear a small like I do better order a medium. Would order again just in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but nice suit!
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit, runs small though. I usually get a large, but will return for an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ❤️💛💚💙
customer_reviews.text: Love it great for all activities at the beach. Colors are nice, well made. I did go a size up and I'm glad I did. I like the top to be loose.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it but every time we wash it the straps on the back get all tangled and it takes a while to fix them
customer_reviews.author: Adam McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is so comfortable and very flattering. It’s true to size and this is actually the second one that I have purchased it is definitely a five-star purchase
customer_reviews.author: sabrina murray

customer_reviews.title: Recommend going up a size
customer_reviews.text: I love this and got a large I usually get a medium or a size 8 went up a size after reading some reviews and it fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: great quality material - have used it about 5 times and no wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Juana Younce

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for curves
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute and a great fit! I have a hard time finding a bathing suit to fit because I have a larger rear and thighs and small waist. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Good quality. Shorts run smaller and top runs larger. Thick material. Love the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Top runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and color. Bottom fits perfectly but the top is too tight around the chest. This bikini is for women who have the smaller chest sizes than the hip sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tankini Swimsuits for Women Push Up Bikini and Boardshort Two Pieces Bathing Suits Sports Swimwear
feature_bullets: Material: 82% Nylon, 18%Spandex. Quick dry, stretchy and comfortable, nice choice of swimwear.
Color-block design looks extremely eye-catching and always popular on trend.
Adjustable shoulder straps crossed on the back, allow for easy size adjustment while built-in non-underwire cups with removable pads can best exaggerate your curve and silhouette.
Package Contents:1 X Top, 1 X Boyshort Bottom.
100% satisfied guarantee. All swimsuits are under strict quality control before shipment. Any problems with the item you received, please contact us without hesitation.
